ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron rubbed his neck the strain from Prowl finally gone, and he watched in bewilderment as Firestrike battled the Maximal leader.

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron rubbed his neck the strain from Prowl finally gone, and he
watched in bewilderment as Firestrike battled the Maximal leader. 

<Firestrike is dangerously unpredictable>, he thought to himself. <How
do I deal with a radical like him.> 

He was woken up from his thoughts by Skullgrin's touch. He looked down
at the quivering mass of Decepticon. He held out his hand, "Yes,
Decepticons forever."

Then Alpha Dolphey's blasts began to rain all around him, as he knelt
down, absorbing a few of the blows for Skullgrin. "We have nothing to
gain here Decepticons, time to pull out." 

He firmly grasped Skullgrin, and hoisted him over his shoulder, then
slowly began to rise off the battlefield. "We will meet again Prowl, and
next time I shall avenge my Decepticons." He then shot a glare down to
Symphony, as he noticed him talking to the enemie. The look he gave said
he knew something, something important.
